info.title: Work Center
info.description: This service is based on OData protocol and can be consumed in Fiori apps and on other user interfaces. It enables you to create, read and update work centers. The service contains work center header, work center description, cost center allocation, capacity assignment, capacity header, capacity description, capacity intervals, capacity shifts, queuing operations, today’s operation, capacity per bucket and capacity order per bucket.

x-sap-shortText: Manage work centers using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [ Make-to-Stock Production - Discrete Manufacturing(BJ5)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/BJ5 " Link To BP ")
[Make-to-Stock - Process Manufacturing Based on Process Order(BJ8)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/BJ8 " Link To BP ")

get.summary: Reads the capacity assignments of all work centers.
get.description: Retrieves the capacity assignments of all work centers. We recommend that you use the latest version of this entity, Capacity Assignment Version 2 (A_WorkCenterAllCapacity_2).

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [Paging - Top](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=66)

skip.name: $skip
